title: Farnborough 1966
brief_description: The Farnborough Air Show features a large range of aircraft: airliners, executive craft, helicopters, military and private planes. For the first time European aircraft are also taking part, all powered by British engines. A great many missiles and aircraft components and accessories are on view, and there is a display of parachuting, gliding and aerobatics.
